mapper.select: /* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hra.mhshra001.service.mapper.Mhshra001Mapper.gnfdCodeData */ SELECT GNFD_CODE, DEPT_CHANGE_AT, CLSF_CHANGE_AT, OFCPS_CHANGE_AT, JSSFC_CHANGE_AT, SRCLS_CHANGE_AT, RSPOFC_CHANGE_AT FROM MHS_GNFD_CODE WHERE USE_AT = '1'

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hra.mhshra001.service.mapper.Mhshra001Mapper.checkDataMhshra001 */
SELECT '1' AS CHK1, A.KOR_NM AS NM FROM MHS_EMP A WHERE A.EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '2' AS CHK1, GNFD_CODE_NM AS NM FROM MHS_GNFD_CODE WHERE GNFD_CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{gnfdCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '3' AS CHK1, CLSF_NM AS NM FROM MHS_CLSF_CODE WHERE CLSF_CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgClsfCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '4' AS CHK1, OFCPS_NM AS NM FROM MHS_OFCPS_CODE WHERE OFCPS_CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgOfcpsCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '5' AS CHK1, RSPOFC_NM AS NM FROM MHS_RSPOFC_CODE WHERE RSPOFC_CODE= REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgRspofcCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '6' AS CHK1, DEPT_KOR_NM AS NM FROM MHS_DEPT WHERE DEPT_CODE= REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgDeptCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '7' AS CHK1, CODE_KOR_NM AS NM FROM STM_CODE WHERE CODEKIND_CODE = 'C285' AND CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgSrclsCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '8' AS CHK1, CODE_KOR_NM AS NM FROM STM_CODE WHERE CODEKIND_CODE = 'C148' AND CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgJssfcCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '9' AS CHK1, CODE_KOR_NM AS NM FROM STM_CODE WHERE CODEKIND_CODE = 'C090' AND CODE = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{afchgJblnCode}, '[^0-9]+')
UNION ALL SELECT '10' AS CHK1, CLSF_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND CLSF_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '11' AS CHK1, SRCLS_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND SRCLS_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '12' AS CHK1, OFCPS_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND OFCPS_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '13' AS CHK1, JSSFC_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND JSSFC_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '14' AS CHK1, RSPOFC_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND RSPOFC_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '15' AS CHK1, DEPT_CODE AS NM FROM MHS_EMP WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND DEPT_CODE IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT '16' AS CHK1, (SELECT B.DEPT_KOR_NM FROM MHS_DEPT B WHERE B.DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS NM FROM MHS_EMP A WHERE EMPNO = REGEXP_REPLACE(#{empno}, '[^0-9]+') AND DEPT_CODE IS NOT NULL

/* kr.co.dbvision.api.mhs.hra.mhshra001.service.mapper.Mhshra001Mapper.checkTargetDataMhshra001 */ SELECT CLSF_CODE, SRCLS_CODE, OFCPS_CODE, JSSFC_CODE, RSPOFC_CODE, DEPT_CODE, (SELECT B.DEPT_KOR_NM FROM MHS_DEPT B WHERE B.DEPT_CODE = A.DEPT_CODE) AS DEPT_KOR_NM FROM MHS_EMP A
AND EMPNO = #{empno}
